Welcome to 2x2x2 Explorer’s documentation!Â¶

Welcome!

2x2x2 Explorer is a special library written to aid in developing new algorithms for the Pocket Cube. Pocket Cube is minified version of the legendary Rubik’s Cube (it’s dimensions are 2x2x2 instead of 3x3x3).

2x2x2 Explorer provides tools for computing various algorithms and for analyzing every possible 2x2x2 situation in general.
